articles.title: Harry, Meghan brand UK tabloid apology for column 'PR stunt' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Prince Harry and wife Meghan on Saturday (Dec 24) accused The Sun of a "PR stunt" after the British tabloid apologised and said it regretted publishing a much-criticised column about the couple. The piece, in which former Top Gear host Jeremy Clarkson said he…
articles.content:
The Sun, which removed the Dec 16 article from its website three days later at the request of Clarkson, said in its Friday apology that it would also now be removed from its archives.
